titleStmt.title: Mercurii, 15. Iunii. 1642. Ordered by the Lords in Parliament, that these particulars shall be forthwith printed and published ... : 1. Martii, 1641. Lord Keeper present, both Houses petitioned the king, wherein is this clause, Viz. Wherefore they are enforced, in all humility, to protest, that if Your Majesty shall persist ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Joseph Hunscott, and John Wright.,

notesStmt.note: Initials; border at head of sheet: printer's ornaments in form of floral emblems of the British kingdoms.
Reproduction of original in: Eton College. Library.
